attributes.action: Require Parliament to watch Bitter Lake
attributes.additional_details: Arrange for all members of Parliament (MPs) to watch the Adam Curtis Documentary named [Bitter Lake] (available on BBC iPlayer) in order to ensure that MPs are given an opportunity to comprehend the possible consequences of intervention in foreign countries in the hope that we may avoid more poor political decisions in future.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the House not for Government
